controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Game Controller initializes the game by calling the game model. It controls the view by actively listing to the view elements and performing the respective actions. Class that achieves the action listener for the user input

      • loadSavedGame

        public void loadSavedGame()
        This method is used to load the saved game entered by user. It shows all the parameters which has been saved by user during game play. All objects are called by this method to get the saved results in the board view.
